alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 8:37AM CDT until April 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Clarke and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural land. 42.0 feet, Water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 43.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to fall, falling below flood stage by late tonight. The river is forecast to then continue falling to a stage of 27.3 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
